description: Pirako Chin is looking for the strongest man in the Kabuki District. Now Gintoki has an underling who wants to turn Kabuki District into a garden of bright red flowers.

titles.title: A Lawless Town Tends to Attract a Bunch of Whoohooey Folk
Muhou no Machi ni Tsudou wa Kyahhou na Yatsu Bakari
無法の街に集うはキャッホーな奴ばかり
